articles.author: Aya Elamroussi, CNN
articles.title: Dangerously high temperatures will last through the weekend with millions of Americans set to experience triple-digit heat - CNN
articles.description: More than 85% of Americans are bracing for temperatures above 90 degrees Fahrenheit through the weekend, with millions in the south-central US expected to experience readings in the triple digits.

articles.title: Americans recognize the climate is changing. But they disagree on why — and what to do about it - CBC News
articles.description: As images of melting runways, buckling railway tracks and raging wildfires consumed the world's attention this week, Americans remained deadlocked on how to slow the climate change that scientists say is driving much of the extreme weather we're seeing.
